mapper.select: select id, alert_count as alertCount from alert where unique_key = #{value}
mapper.update: update alert set level = #{level}, title = #{title}, alert_time = #{alertTime}, type = #{type}, status = #{status}, source = #{source}, entity_type = #{entityType}, entity_name = #{entityName}, ip = #{ip}, port = #{port} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into alert_attr (alert_id, content) values (#{id}, #{attrObjStr,typeHandler=CompressHandler}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE content = #{attrObjStr,typeHandler=CompressHandler}

insert into alert (id, level, title, alert_time, type, status, source, is_delete, unique_key, entity_type, entity_name, ip, port) values (#{id}, #{level}, #{title}, #{alertTime}, #{type}, #{status}, #{source}, 0, #{uniqueKey}, #{entityType}, #{entityName}, #{ip}, #{port})
insert into alert_origin (id, content, type, time, error, status) values (#{id}, #{content, typeHandler=CompressHandler}, #{type}, #{time}, #{error, typeHandler=CompressHandler}, #{status})
